I get "Cliff of Dover Launcher has encountered a problem and needs to close" when I start the launcher, I see on google many have same problem and the fixes dont work for me or everyone.

Guys I found the answer to the ""Cliff of Dover Launcher has encountered a problem and needs to close" problem. I tried it on Win XP SP3 using Omega graphics drivers and got the error, but then tried on Win7 using ATI graphics drivers and it works BUT when I started the launcher I got "Launcher not responding, do you want to close" and I clicked "no" and waited about 1 seconds (i could see the drive was busy) and the game started and works fine.

Its could be the graphics drivers but my guess is you need Win7.

System requirements

Minimum

    OS: Windows XP SP3 / Windows Vista SP2 / Windows 7
    Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core 2.0GHz or AMD Athlon X2 3800+
    Memory: 2 GB
    Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compliant, 512MB Video Card
    DirectX: DirectX 9.0c
    Hard Drive: 10GB free disk space
    Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
    Multiplay: Broadband connection with 128 kbps upstream or faster

Recommended

    OS: Windows XP SP3 / Windows Vista SP2 / Windows 7
    Processor: Intel Core i5 2.66GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 2.6GHz
    Memory: 4 GB
    Graphics: DirectX 10 compliant, 1GB Video Card
    DirectX: DirectX 10.0
    Hard Drive: 10GB free disk space
    Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
    Multiplay: Broadband connection with 128 kbps upstream or faster

The recommended system is a pretty powerful mid-close to-high-end desktop.. Your "new" core i3 laptop just won't cut it
